warscrolls.name: Aleguzzler Gargant
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz

abilities.name: Stuff 'Em In Me Bag
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is at least double the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Timberrrrr!
abilities.effect: When this unit is destroyed, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of this unit. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than this unit.

warscrolls.name: Arachnarok Spider with Flinger
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Arachnarok, Spiderfang

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Chitinous Legs** is 6.

abilities.name: Beast-binding Webbing
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s **Companion** weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had **FLY**.

abilities.name: Flinger
abilities.effect: If any attacks made with this unit’s **Flinger** score a hit, after the **SHOOT** ability has been resolved, roll a dice. On a 2+, halve the Move characteristic of the target unit until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Arachnarok Spider with Spiderfang Warparty
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Arachnarok, Spiderfang

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Chitinous Legs** is 6.

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had **FLY**.

abilities.name: Voracious Predator
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 1" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Bad Moon Loonshrine
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz

abilities.name: Moonclan Lairs
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Your Turn
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO** non-**MONSTER** non‑**WAR MACHINE GLOOMSPITE GITZ** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this terrain feature and more than 3" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Boingrot Bounderz
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Fly, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Squig, Moonclan

abilities.name: Boing! Smash!
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase,  pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Borgit's Beastgrabbaz
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Uglug the Troggoth
abilities.effect: While this unit includes **Uglug**, ignore the first damage point allocated to it each phase.

abilities.name: Borgit's Masterplan
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if any models in this unit have been slain.
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST**.
• Double the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons.
• This unit’s attacks must target an enemy **MONSTER** or **BEAST**.

warscrolls.name: Dankhold Troggboss
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Troggoth

abilities.name: Greater Regeneration
abilities.effect: **Heal (D6)** this unit.

abilities.name: Magical Resistance
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 4+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit.

abilities.name: Shepherd of Destruction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **TROGGOTH** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Dankhold Troggoth
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Troggoth

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: **Heal (D3)** this unit.

abilities.name: Magical Resistance
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 4+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit.

abilities.name: Wade and Smash
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: This unit can move 6" but must end that move in combat. Then, roll a D3 for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Doom Diver Catapult
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Gitmob

abilities.name: Shoddy Wing-Like Gizmos
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase
abilities.effect: You can re-roll hit rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks this turn, but for each hit roll that is re-rolled, subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of this unit’s **Doom Diver** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Droggz Da Sunchompa
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Cavalry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Gitmob

abilities.name: Time Ta Scarper
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for a unit wholly within 9" of this unit
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the unit using that **FIGHT** ability can move 2D6"  after that **FIGHT** ability has been resolved. It can move through the combat ranges of any enemy units but cannot end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Rip 'Em Ta Bits
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **GITMOB** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

abilities.name: Da Frazzlefangz
abilities.effect:
While an enemy unit is within 6" of this unit:

•  Subtract 1 from hit rolls for that enemy unit’s attacks.
•  That enemy unit cannot use the ‘All-out Attack’ command.

warscrolls.name: Fellwater Troggoths
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Troggoth

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: **Heal (D3)** this unit.

abilities.name: Noxious Vomit
abilities.effect:
If any damage points are allocated to an enemy unit by attacks made with this unit’s **Noxious Vomit**, that unit is **drenched in vomit** until the start of your next turn.

While a unit is **drenched in vomit**:
• Subtract 1 from save rolls for that unit.
• Ignore positive modifiers to save rolls for that unit.

warscrolls.name: Frazzlegit Shaman on War-Wheela
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (1), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Gitmob

abilities.name: Gimme All Da Light
abilities.effect: Friendly **GITMOB** units that are not **Frazzlegit Shamans on War-Wheelas** cannot be targeted by shooting attacks while they are wholly within 6" of this unit.

abilities.name: Frazzlemist
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 visible enemy units within 9" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Fungoid Cave-Shaman
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Deffcap Mushroom
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
abilities.effect: Add 1 to this unit’s power level for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Gobbapalooza
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Wizard (1), Infantry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Hallucinogenic Fungus Brews
abilities.effect: In the first battle round, this unit has **WARD (4+)**. In the second battle round, this unit has **WARD (5+)**. In the third and subsequent battle rounds, this unit has **WARD (6+)**.

abilities.name: Gobbapalooza Know-Wotz
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+, pick 1 of the following effects:

***Glareface Dance:*** Pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ** unit within this unit’s combat range. Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for that unit until the start of your next turn.

***Nasty Poisons:*** Pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ** unit within this unit’s combat range. Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that unit’s weapons until the start of your next turn.

***Mesmerise:*** Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit. Until the start of your next turn, that unit cannot use commands.

warscrolls.name: Grinkrak's Looncourt
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Quest's End
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if you control the **object of this unit’s quest** and this unit is contesting it.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** and **WARD (4+)**.

abilities.name: The Looncourt's Quest
abilities.effect: Pick an objective or terrain feature within enemy territory to be the **object of this unit’s quest**.

warscrolls.name: Kragnos, the End of Empires
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (5+), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **The Dread Mace** is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: The Shield Inviolate
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per **SPELL** ability.

abilities.name: Avatar of Destruction
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: The End of Empires
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for friendly **DESTRUCTION** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Rampaging Destruction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.effect:
If this unit charged this phase, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.
• Pick an enemy **MONSTER** in combat with this unit and roll 2D6. On a 7, this ability has no effect. Otherwise, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the results on the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal damage (2 × 6).

warscrolls.name: Loonboss
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Let's Get Stabbin'!
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO MOONCLAN INFANTRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

abilities.name: I'm Da Boss
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **Moonclan Stabbas** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects:

***Get Back ’Ere!***: If the target is not in combat, you can return D6 slain models to it.

***Stab ’Em Good!***: Add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Loonboss on Giant Cave Squig
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Fly, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Squig, Moonclan

abilities.name: Let's Get Bouncin'!
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO MOONCLAN CAVALRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Loonboss on Mangler Squigs
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Fly, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Squig, Moonclan

abilities.name: Squig Rage
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Huge Fang-filled Gobs** is 6.

abilities.name: Ker-Splat!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit, to a maximum of 10. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Bite Da Moon!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and all friendly **SQUIG** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with the targets’ **Fang-filled Gobs,** **Massive Fang-filled Gobs** and **Huge Fang-filled Gobs** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Watch Out!
abilities.effect: If this unit is destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice for each enemy unit within this unit’s combat range. On a 4+, inflict D3 mortal damage on that unit.

warscrolls.name: Loonboss with Giant Cave Squig
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Squig, Moonclan

abilities.name: Gobbled Up
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Goin' Somewhere?
abilities.effect: If a friendly **MOONCLAN INFANTRY** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6. However, friendly **MOONCLAN INFANTRY** units cannot use **RETREAT** abilities while they are within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Loonsmasha Fanatics
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Release the Fanatics!
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **hidden among the mobs**. Then, pick a friendly **Moonclan Shootas** or **Moonclan Stabbas** unit that has 10 or more models to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 6" of the target and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
abilities.effect: This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST.**

abilities.name: Hidden Loons
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **hidden among the mobs**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Madcap Shaman
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Madcap Mushroom
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• Add 1 to this unit’s power level.
• If 2 or more dice in a casting roll for this unit have the same value, inflict D3 mortal damage on this unit after the **SPELL** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Malevolent Moon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz

abilities.name: Lurid Light
abilities.effect: While friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ** units are wholly within 12" of this Manifestation they are affected by all four faces of the Bad Moon (Grinnin’, Scowlin’, Sulkin’ and Cacklin’).

warscrolls.name: Mangler Squigs
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Fly, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Squig, Moonclan

abilities.name: Squig Rage
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Huge Fang-filled Gobs** is 6.

abilities.name: Giant Boing!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move 3D6" but must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Watch Out!
abilities.effect: If this unit is destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice for each enemy unit within this unit’s combat range. On a 4+, inflict D3 mortal damage on that unit.

warscrolls.name: Mollog
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Troggoth

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: **Heal (D3)** this unit.

abilities.name: Bitey Distractions
abilities.effect: This unit has **WARD (5+)** while any of its tokens are on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Unleash The Critters!
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

***Spore Cloud:*** Remove this unit’s **Spiteshroom**. For the rest of the turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

***Bat Squig Attack!:*** Remove this unit’s **Bat Squig**. Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

***Rock-hard Skin:*** Remove this unit’s **Stalagsquig**. Ignore all modifiers to save rolls for this unit (positive and negative) for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Mollog's Mob
abilities.effect: This unit’s **Bat Squig**, **Spiteshroom** and **Stalagsquig** are tokens. After setting up this unit on the battlefield for the first time, place its tokens next to it.

warscrolls.name: Moonclan Shootas
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/20), Standard Bearer (1/20), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Netters
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Moonclan Stabbas
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/20), Standard Bearer (1/20), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Netters
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Mork’s Mighty Mushroom
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz

abilities.name: Mutating Spores
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 6" of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the targets.
abilities.effect: For each target, roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in that unit that are within 6" of this **MANIFESTATION**. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Rabble-Rowza
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: 'Neh Neh Na-Neh Neh! Can't Catch Me!'
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **MONSTER** or **BEAST** unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, the target can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** ability in the same turn, but each time it uses a **MOVE** ability, it must end the move closer to this unit. In addition, for the rest of the turn, the first time the target ends a move within this unit’s combat range, inflict D6 mortal damage on this unit.

abilities.name: Emerge from the Depths
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **in a secret tunnel**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Secret Tunnels
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **in a secret tunnel**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Rippa's Snarlfangs
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Cavalry, Champion, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Gitmob

abilities.name: Marking Your Territory
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s **Wolfgit** **Weapons** while it contests an objective you control that is not contested by any other friendly units.

abilities.name: Hamstring
abilities.phaseDetails: Once per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit’s **Mean-eye** is on the battlefield and not in combat, pick a visible enemy unit within 15" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the target is damaged. On a 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Rockgut Troggoths
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Ward (5+), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Troggoth

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: **Heal (D3)** this unit.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Loonsmasha Fanatics
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Lost in the Horde
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **lost in the horde**. This unit has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Whirling Destruction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **lost in the horde**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 3" of a friendly **Moonclan Stabbas** or **Moonclan Shootas** unit. Then, this unit can move 2D6". It can pass through enemy models and their combat ranges and can end that move in combat. Then, roll a dice for each enemy unit in combat with this unit or that this unit passed across as part of that move. Inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll. If this unit ended that move in combat, it has charged.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Sporesplatta Fanatics
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Choking Spore-Clouds
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of weapons used by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Spinning Loons
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.effect: If this unit was not set up this phase, this unit can move 2D6". It can move through the combat ranges of enemy units and can finish that move in combat.

warscrolls.name: Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz

abilities.name: Blessings of the Cauldron
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** within 1" of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the target’s power level until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Scuttleboss on Gigantic Spider
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Spiderfang

abilities.name: Scuttle Away!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: If this unit is in combat, pick this unit and up to 1 friendly **Spider Riders** unit that is in combat and wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: The targets can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on them.

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had **FLY**.

warscrolls.name: Scuttletide
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz

abilities.name: Endless Terrors
abilities.effect: This unit has **WARD (4+)** while it is wholly within 12" of any friendly **ARACHNAROK** units.

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This **MANIFESTATION** can pass across terrain features as if it had **FLY**.

warscrolls.name: Skitterstrand Arachnarok
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Arachnarok, Spiderfang

abilities.name: Ambush from Beyond
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **skittering through tunnels in reality**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had **FLY**.

abilities.name: Realmweb Lurker
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **skittering through tunnels in reality**. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Scuttling Terror
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect:
If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move 2D6". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units and can pass through models in enemy **INFANTRY** units, but it must end that move in combat.

Then, pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit that this unit passed across during that move. Inflict D3 mortal damage on that enemy unit.

warscrolls.name: Skragrott, the Loonking
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Wizard (2), Infantry, Ward (4+), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Babbling Wand
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly **MOONCLAN** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Redeploy’ command, no command points are spent.

abilities.name: Fangz of Da Bad Moon
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the unmodified casting roll. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: The Loonking's Entreaty
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Reaction: You declared the ‘The Faces of the Bad Moon’ ability
abilities.effect: The face of the Bad Moon stays in its current position this battle round instead of moving to the next face in the sequence.

warscrolls.name: Snarlboss
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Gitmob

abilities.name: Boss Snarlfang
abilities.effect: Add 2 to charge rolls for friendly **GITMOB CAVALRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Vicious Snarls and Great Howls
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick this unit and up to 2 friendly **GITMOB CAVALRY** units within this unit’s combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ **Companion** melee weapons.

warscrolls.name: Snarlboss on War-Wheela
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Gitmob

abilities.name: Keepin' Up Wiv Da Boss
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **Sunsteala Wheelas** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit's combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

abilities.name: Da Glare of Frazzlegit
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Hero Phase
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn:
• ﻿﻿Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are in combat with any friendly **Sunsteala Wheelas**.
• ﻿﻿Add 6" to the Move characteristic of this unit and friendly **Sunsteala Wheelas**.

abilities.name: Frazzlegit's Flame Stream
abilities.effect:
This unit can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can pass through other models and the combat ranges of enemy units, but it cannot end that move in combat. Then, pick up to 1 enemy **INFANTRY** unit that this unit passed across during that move to be the target. Inflict D6 mortal damage on the target.

**Designer’s Note:** *This unit can use this ability even if it is in combat.*

warscrolls.name: Snarlfang Riders
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Gitmob

abilities.name: Can't Catch Us
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Movement Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is not in combat, this unit can move D6". It cannot end that move in combat.

warscrolls.name: Snarlpack Cavalry
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Gitmob

abilities.name: Markin' Territory
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, add 5 to its control score for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Frazzleburned Scrap
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, it has has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Sneaky Snufflers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Ward (5+), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Looncap Mushrooms
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, pick a friendly **MOONCLAN** unit wholly within 12" of it and visible to it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the face of the Bad Moon is **Cacklin’** this turn. On a 3+, the target has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn. On a 6+, also add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Spider Riders
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Spiderfang

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had **FLY**.

warscrolls.name: Sporesplatta Fanatics
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: A Prod in the Right Direction
abilities.effect: This unit can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

abilities.name: Puffshroom Frenzy
abilities.effect:
Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by other friendly **MOONCLAN** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

Subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

warscrolls.name: Squig Herd
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Squig, Moonclan

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Squigs Gone Wild
abilities.effect: Each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. On a 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Herding Squigs
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each **Squig Herder** in this unit. For each 2+, you can return D3 slain **Cave Squigs** to this unit. For each 1, 1 **Squig Herder** in this unit is slain.

warscrolls.name: Squig Hoppers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Fly, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Squig, Moonclan

abilities.name: Boing! Boing! Boing!
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across this phase to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit that passed across the target. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Squigboss with Gnasha-Squig
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Squig, Moonclan

abilities.name: Feedin' Time
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SQUIG** unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply for the rest of the turn:

***Crimson Deffcap:*** Add 3" to the target’s Move characteristic.

***Yellow Lurka:*** The target’s **Fang-filled Gobs, Huge Fang-filled Gobs** or **Massive Fang-filled Gobs** have **Crit (Mortal)**.

warscrolls.name: Sunsteala Wheelas
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Champion, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Gitmob

abilities.name: Careening Destruction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Movement Phase
abilities.effect:
If this unit is in combat, it can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can pass through other models and the combat ranges of enemy units, but it cannot end that move in combat. Then, pick up to 1 enemy **INFANTRY** or **CAVALRY** unit that this unit passed across during that move to be the target. Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Add 1 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted for each model in this unit

**Designer’s Note:** *This unit can use this ability even if it is in combat.*

warscrolls.name: Trugg, the Troggoth King
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Troggoth

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, when it uses the 'Malfunctioning Leystone' ability, roll 1 dice instead of 3.

abilities.name: Greater Regeneration
abilities.effect: **Heal (D6)** this unit.

abilities.name: Crushing Grip
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Malfunctioning Leystone
abilities.effect:
Roll 3 dice. You must pick 1 of those dice and apply the effect that corresponds to its value. Effects 2-6 persist until the start of your next turn.

***1 - Glyph of Shyish:*** Inflict D3 mortal damage on this unit.

***2 -  Glyph of Ghur:*** Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **TROGGOTH** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

***3 -  Glyph of Aqshy:*** Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **TROGGOTH** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

***4 - Glyph of Hysh:*** This unit can use **UNBIND** abilities as if it had **WIZARD (1)**.

***5 - Glyph of Ulgu:*** Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly **TROGGOTH** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

***6 - Glyph of Chamon:*** This unit has **WARD (5+)**.

warscrolls.name: Webspinner Shaman
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Spiderfang

abilities.name: Speed of the Spider God
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **SPIDERFANG** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target can use a **RUN** ability this turn and still use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn.

abilities.name: Web Slingshot
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SPIDERFANG** unit or terrain feature within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 3" of the target and more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Webspinner Shaman on Arachnarok Spider
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Arachnarok, Spiderfang

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Chitinous Legs** is 6.

abilities.name: Ensnaring Webbing
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **INFANTRY HERO** within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Wall Crawler
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had **FLY**.

abilities.name: Catchweb Spidershrine
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **SPIDERFANG WIZARDS** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Wolfgit Retinue
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Gitmob

abilities.name: I Got Dis, Boss
abilities.effect: While a friendly **Snarlboss** is within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and that **Snarlboss** have **WARD (5+)**.

warscrolls.name: Zarbag's Gitz
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Destruction, Gloomspite Gitz, Moonclan

abilities.name: Sniffer Spite
abilities.effect: If this unit’s **Zarbag** is on the battlefield and within 3" of a terrain feature, roll a dice. On a 4+, add 1 to this unit’s power level for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Zarbag
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Zarbag** is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**.

rules.name: Grots Upon Grots
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
rules.declare: Pick a friendly non-**SQUIG MOONCLAN** unit that is contesting an objective to be the target.
rules.effect: Add 1 to the control score of the target unit for each model in that unit that is not contesting any objectives.

rules.name: Git and Run
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **GITMOB** unit that is in combat to use this ability. Then, you can pick an enemy unit in combat with that **GITMOB** unit to be the target. The same enemy unit cannot be picked to be the target of this ability more than once per phase.
rules.effect: If you picked a target, roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Then, the unit using this ability can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can move through the combat ranges of enemy units but cannot end that move in combat.

rules.name: Extra Snappy
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
rules.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **GITMOB** units that charged this turn to be the targets.
rules.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of **Companion** weapons used by the targets for the rest of turn.

rules.name: Herd Healing
rules.effect: Each time a friendly **TROGGOTH** unit uses a **FIGHT** ability, after that ability has been resolved, **Heal (D3)** that unit.

rules.name: Spreading Loonacy
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Your Turn
rules.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly non‑**SQUIG MOONCLAN** or **SPIDERFANG** units in combat to be the targets.
rules.effect:
For each target:

• Make a pile-in move with the target.
• Then, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

rules.name: Bouncing Fury
rules.effect: Each time a friendly **SQUIG** unit charges, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its **Fang-filled Gobs**, **Massive Fang-filled** **Gobs** or **Huge Fang-filled Gobs** for the rest of the turn.

spells.name: The Hand of Gork
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ** unit wholly within 12" of them and not in combat to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 24" of the caster and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Spore Maws
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick up to 3 visible enemy units within 12" of them to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

spells.name: Bad Portents
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Roll a dice. On 1-2, nothing happens. On a 3-5, the face of the Bad Moon moves to the next face. On a 6, pick a new face of the Bad Moon for this battle round.

spells.name: Gaze of Glareface
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:
• The target cannot use **RUN** abilities.
• Halve the Range characteristic of the target’s ranged weapons.

spells.name: Bright Fright
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick up to 3 friendly visible **GLOOMSPITE GITZ** units wholly within 12" of them to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Each target can immediately use a **RETREAT** ability as if it was your movement phase. No mortal damage is inflicted on the targets by those **RETREAT** abilities.

spells.name: Gitspeed
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly non-**TROGGOTH GLOOMSPITE GITZ** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

spells.name: Summon Mork's Mighty Mushroom
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Mork’s Mighty Mushroom** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Mork’s Mighty Mushroom** wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.

spells.name: Summon Scuttletide
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Scuttletide** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Scuttletide** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Malevolent Moon
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Malevolent Moon** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Malevolent Moon** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Scrapskuttle’s Arachnacauldron** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts.name: Loonstone Medallion
artefacts.effect: This unit has **WARD (6+)**. While this unit is contesting an objective that is not being contested by any other friendly units, it has **WARD (5+)**.

artefacts.name: Wotnot of Prestige
artefacts.declare: Pick a point on the battlefield within 9" of this unit. Each visible enemy unit within 3" of that point is a target.
artefacts.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

artefacts.name: Moonhoned Shiv
artefacts.effect: Pick 1 of this unit’s non-**Companion** melee weapons. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that weapon for the rest of the battle. In addition, each time this unit uses a **RETREAT** ability, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that weapon for the rest of the battle. This unit can be affected by this ability multiple times and the effects are cumulative.

artefacts.name: Crunchy Shinies
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Movement Phase
artefacts.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 3 to run rolls and charge rolls for this unit.

artefacts.name: Glareface's Grin
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Shooting Phase
artefacts.declare: Pick a point on the battlefield within 9" of this unit. Each visible enemy unit within 3" of that point is a target.
artefacts.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

artefacts.name: The Clammy Cowl
artefacts.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit.

artefacts.name: Backstabber's Blade
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

artefacts.name: Leering Gitshield
artefacts.effect: Each time an unmodified hit roll for an attack that targets this unit is 1, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **ATTACK** ability has been resolved.

heroicTraits.name: Glarejester
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **INFANTRY** unit within 3" of this unit and that is not in combat to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Roll a D3. Add the roll to the distance the target can move when using **MOVE** abilities this phase. If the target ends a move in this phase within 3" of this **HERO**, inflict an amount of mortal damage on this **HERO** equal to the roll.

heroicTraits.name: Da King's Adjutant
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), End of Your Turn
heroicTraits.declare: You cannot use this ability and the **Bad Moon Loonshrine**’s ‘Moonclan Lairs’ ability in the same turn. If this unit is within 12" of a friendly **Bad Moon Loonshrine**, pick a friendly non-reinforced, non-**HERO**, non-**MONSTER KING’S GITZ** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Set up a replacement unit wholly within 12" of a friendly **Bad Moon Loonshrine** and more than 3" from all enemy units.

heroicTraits.name: Loonstone Teef
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
heroicTraits.effect: This unit can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has **STRIKE‑LAST** for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Plucky Git
heroicTraits.effect: While this unit has no damage points, friendly **DROGGZ'S** **GITMOB** units have **WARD (6+)** while they are wholly within 9" of this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Stick 'Em and Run
heroicTraits.effect: Each time this unit uses a **RETREAT** ability or the ‘Frazzlegit’s Flame Stream’ ability, before moving this unit, pick an enemy unit in combat with it and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

heroicTraits.name: Fight Another Day
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

heroicTraits.name: The Clammy Hand
heroicTraits.effect: Each time a friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

heroicTraits.name: Loontouched
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is not a **WIZARD**, it has **WIZARD (1)**. Otherwise, add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

other.name: Taktikal Cowering
other.effect:
While the **Loonboss** in this Regiment of Renown is within the combat range of the **Dankhold Troggoth** in this Regiment of Renown:

• That **Loonboss** has **WARD** (4+).
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for that **Loonboss**, allocate 1 damage point to that **Dankhold Troggoth** after the damage sequence for that **Loonboss** has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

other.name: Go Dat Way!
other.declare: Pick the **Dankhold Troggoth** in this Regiment of Renown to be the target if it is within 12" of the **Loonboss** in this Regiment of Renown.
other.effect: For the rest of the turn, the target can still use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

other.name: Ambush Time!
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Movement Phase
other.declare: Pick all units in this Regiment of Renown if they are **prowlin’ around**.
other.effect: Set up those units anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

other.name: Sneaky Prowlin'
other.declare: Pick all units in this Regiment of Renown if none of them have been deployed.
other.effect: Set up those units in reserve **prowlin’ around**. They have now been deployed.

other.name: On Da Moon's Trail
other.effect: The melee weapons of units in this Regiment of Renown have **Anti-charge (+1 Rend)** while they are contesting an objective you control.

other.name: Sneaky Distraction
other.declare: Pick the **Gobbapalooza** in this Regiment of Renown to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
other.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are wholly within 12" of the caster.

other.name: Sudden Emergence
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Movement Phase
other.declare: If the **Rabble-Rowza** in this Regiment of Renown is **in a** **super-secret tunnel**, pick it to be the target.
other.effect: Set up the target anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, set up all other friendly units that are **in a super-secret tunnel** within 3" of the target and more than 9" from all enemy units.

other.name: Super-Secret Tunnels
other.declare: Pick a unit in this Regiment of Renown that has not been deployed.
other.effect: Set up that unit in reserve in a **super-secret tunnel**. It has now been deployed.

battleTraits.name: The Faces of the Bad Moon
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.declare: You must use this ability at the start of the battle round. If multiple players are commanding a Gloomspite Gitz army, then instead, at the start of the battle round, those players roll off and only the winner declares and uses this ability this battle round.
battleTraits.effect: If it is the first battle round, pick the starting face of the Bad Moon (**Grinnin’**, **Scowlin’**, **Sulkin’** or **Cacklin’**). If it is not the first battle round, the face of the Bad Moon moves to the next face in the sequence.

battleTraits.name: Under the Light of the Bad Moon
battleTraits.effect:
During the battle, the effects below apply to friendly **GLOOMSPITE GITZ** units based on the current face of the Bad Moon:

***Frothing Zealots***: While the Bad Moon is **Cacklin’** or **Grinnin’**, add 5 to the control scores of friendly non-**SQUIG** **MOONCLAN** units.

***Spiderfang Venom***: While the Bad Moon is **Cacklin’** or **Grinnin’**, combat attacks made by friendly **SPIDERFANG** units score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+. This also affects **Companion** weapons.

***Moonlit Hide***: While the Bad Moon is **Grinnin’** or **Scowlin’**, subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of combat attacks that target friendly **TROGGOTH** units.

***Lunar Squigs***: While the Bad Moon is **Scowlin’** or **Sulkin’**, instead of rolling the dice to determine the Move characteristic of a friendly **SQUIG** unit, you can use a value of 4.

***Sneaky Snarlfangs***: While the Bad Moon is **Sulkin’** or **Cacklin’**, friendly **GITMOB** units can use **CHARGE** and **SHOOT** abilities even if they used a **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

battleTraits.name: Da King's Guards
battleTraits.effect:
While a friendly **TROGGOTH** unit is within the combat range of a friendly **HERO**:

• That **HERO** has **WARD (4+)**.
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for that **HERO**, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly **TROGGOTH** unit within that **HERO**’s combat range after the damage sequence for that **HERO** has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

battleTraits.name: Da Loonking's Court
battleTraits.declare: Pick up to D3 friendly non-**UNIQUE KING’S GITZ HEROES** that do not have an enhancement.
battleTraits.effect:
Give each **HERO** 1 enhancement from the ‘Da King’s Gitz’ Army of Renown rules.

**Designer’s Note**: *These enhancements are given to the* **HEROES** *during the deployment phase, not during army composition.*

battleTraits.name: The Moon and The Loon
battleTraits.effect:
While a friendly unit is wholly within 9" of a friendly **Skragrott**, a friendly **Malevolent Moon** or a friendly **Bad Moon Loonshrine**:

•  Add 5 to the control scores of friendly non-**SQUIG MOONCLAN** units.
•  Instead of rolling the dice to determine the Move characteristic of a friendly **SQUIG** unit, you can use a value of 4.

battleTraits.name: Herd Healing
battleTraits.effect: Each time a friendly **TROGGOTH** unit uses a **FIGHT** ability, after that ability has been resolved, **Heal (D3)** that unit.

battleTraits.name: Moon-toughened Hide
battleTraits.effect: In battle rounds 2 and 3, subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used for attacks that target friendly **TRUGG’S TROGGHERD** units.

battleTraits.name: Broken Slumber
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **TRUGG’S TROGGHERD** unit that is a **living** **landmark**.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 3" of a terrain feature and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Living Landmark
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **TRUGG’S TROGGHERD** unit that has not been deployed.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit in reserve as a **living landmark**. It has now been deployed.

battleTraits.name: Aura of Haywire Magic
battleTraits.effect: The effects of a friendly **Trugg**’s ‘Malfunctioning Leystone’ ability affect friendly **TRUGG’S TROGGHERD** units anywhere on the battlefield instead of only those wholly within 12" of that friendly **Trugg**.

battleTraits.name: Dis Fight's Not Fer Me
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **DROGGZ'S GITMOB** unit that is in combat with any enemy units that charged this turn and is not in combat with any enemy units that did not charge this turn to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target can immediately use the 'Retreat' ability as if it were your movement phase.

battleTraits.name: Surprise, Ya Gitz!
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **DROGGZ’S GITMOB** unit that is **outflanking the enemy**.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit on the battlefield wholly within 6" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Glowering Light
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with a friendly **DROGGZ’S GITMOB** unit that has charged this turn to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn, the target cannot make a pile-in move when it is picked to use a **FIGHT** ability.

battleTraits.name: Get Around 'Em
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **DROGGZ’S GITMOB** unit that has not been deployed.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit in reserve **outflanking the enemy**. It has now been deployed.
